title: 09/15: Weekend Roundup - Big Performances and Big Injuries (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We react to the Drew Brees and Ben Roethlisberger injuries (1:50). What would extended absences mean for their teammates? Then we've got two big QB questions (7:30): Should you really sell high on Lamar Jackson? And how do we value the incredible Patrick Mahomes now? Then a quick look at the Waiver Wire after Sunday's games (14:00). Which KC WR are we prioritizing? ... Winners (17:24) like Carlos Hyde, Mark Andrews, Josh Allen and Matt Breida. How big of a winner is Todd Gurley (27:05)? And losers (29:10) such as Jared Goff and Dede Westbrook. We also have the Waiverometer (37:50), the Worryometer (38:30) and the Top 5 at each position (42:42) ... A "Believe it or Not" edition of the game recaps (49:15)! We review each game and Heath gives us a "Believe it or Not" and then Adams gives his own and gets under Heath's skin! ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
